analysis.description:
TokenVesting.addToVestMap (/unique_chucks/5/0x51c1a88a007411ca7af351218ea6448ed8f381c1.sol#364-383) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_start > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/5/0x51c1a88a007411ca7af351218ea6448ed8f381c1.sol#373-375)

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/5/0x51c1a88a007411ca7af351218ea6448ed8f381c1.sol#428-446) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < value.cliff (/unique_chucks/5/0x51c1a88a007411ca7af351218ea6448ed8f381c1.sol#441-446)
	- block.timestamp >= value.start.add(value.duration) (/unique_chucks/5/0x51c1a88a007411ca7af351218ea6448ed8f381c1.sol#441-446)
